level.heading: Method of voting on amendment of organic rules.

level.text: A substantive change to a proposed amendment of the organic rules shall not be made at the members meeting at which a vote on the amendment occurs.

A nonsubstantive change to a proposed amendment of the organic rules may be made at the members meeting at which the vote on the amendment occurs and need not be separately voted upon by the board of directors.
A vote to adopt a nonsubstantive change to a proposed amendment to the organic rules shall be by the same percentage of votes required to pass a proposed amendment.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based on ยง 403 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act.
